article_title: 8 Stories You Should Know About Today: Friday, Jan. 16
article_text: Jon Brooks is the host and editor of KQED’s health and technology blog, Future of You. He is the former editor of KQED’s daily news blog, News Fix. A veteran blogger, he previously worked for Yahoo! in various news writing and editing roles. He was also the editor of EconomyBeat.org, which documented user-generated content about the financial crisis and recession. Jon is also a playwright whose work has been produced in San Francisco, New York, Italy, and around the U.S. He has written about film for his own blog and studied film at Boston University. He has an MFA in Creative Writing from Brooklyn College.

article_metadata.description: Protests disrupt BART in S.F., a building in Oakland. Google Glass going away. Grateful Dead reuniting.

article_summary:
Jon Brooks is the host and editor of KQED’s health and technology blog, Future of You.
He has written about film for his own blog and studied film at Boston University.
Jon is also a playwright whose work has been produced in San Francisco, New York, Italy, and around the U.S.
He is the former editor of KQED’s daily news blog, News Fix.
He was also the editor of EconomyBeat.org, which documented user-generated content about the financial crisis and recession.
